text: Pseudoricopis excavatipennis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Pseudoricopis. It was described by Breuning in 1970.Biolib.cz - Pseudoricopis excavatipennis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1970 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Pseudoricopis
